backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing blog storage, user email management, and admin-role access control with allow‑list admin bootstrap and site maintenance flag.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping deployment‑related features to their associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, including styling, configuration, marketing components, and static assets.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing local setup, build steps, and instructions for promoting Version 30 to mainnet with verification steps and production notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon, viewport, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application configuring TanStack Router routes, global providers, and layout with site‑live gating and admin route protection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing login or access‑denied screens when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth flow and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Student enquiry form that validates required fields and, upon submission, displays a summary with WhatsApp, SMS, email, and phone contact actions.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Teacher enquiry form collecting experience and teaching details, then showing a summary with messaging and contact options after submission.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Displays a maintenance notice with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Site: Gates public routes based on site live status, showing loaders, errors, or maintenance screen while allowing admin routes through.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Simple contact form with validation and a submission confirmation screen.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Renders a marketing footer with branding, quick links, contact options, and social/media actions, handling navigation and email/WhatsApp links.
Provides a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle for the marketing site.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Displays WhatsApp, call, SMS, and email contact options using cards with actionable buttons.
Shows an accordion-based FAQ list sourced from site content.
Provides the main hero banner with headline, CTAs, feature highlights, and a hero image.
Outlines four steps of the service workflow using icon cards.
Lists tutoring service categories with icons and descriptions.
Displays testimonial cards with ratings, quotes, and author info.
Displays three trust statistics cards using values from siteContent with icons and styled layout.
Renders four value-proposition cards with icons and descriptions explaining key tutoring benefits.
frontend/src/config/logoConfig.ts: Provides a centralized function to determine the correct logo URL using environment variables, local paths, or public domain settings.
frontend/src/config/publicDomain.ts: Defines helpers to get the public domain, full public URL, and asset URLs based on environment variables or window hostname.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Holds site branding constants like site name and utilities for generating page titles.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Exports structured terms and conditions content with sections referencing the site name.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Contains marketing copy including hero text, value propositions, services, steps, and testimonials.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides contact info, social links, form options, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs for site use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty placeholder file for a custom cursor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and loading identities from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Custom hook that updates the document title and description meta tag based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend blog and user APIs, including fetching, creating, editing, and deleting blogs and user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Utility functions to generate WhatsApp, SMS, phone, and email links and prefabricated messages for student and teacher inquiries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app in the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing blogs, including creating, editing, publishing, and deleting posts, with site-live controls.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Admin setup page for bootstrapping admin access, managing email, and validating identity via Internet Identity and a secret token.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post, handling loading, not-found states, and metadata updates.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blogs with previews and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact options including WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email with actionable buttons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage composed of multiple marketing sections with metadata setup.
Standalone marketing landing page with manual meta tag updates and full marketing section layout.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Provides a detailed setup checklist for configuring site metadata, domain, logos, and related settings.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form with header and metadata configuration.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Displays the teacher registration form with header and metadata configuration.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows terms and conditions content with metadata and structured legal sections.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage stored parameters.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: HTML page for the standalone GrowWithTutor landing site with configurable branding and multiple sections.
Explains the standalone GrowWithTutor landing page structure and how to run it locally.
Defines editable content data for the standalone landing page, including hero, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQ.
CSS styling for the standalone GrowWithTutor landing page, covering layout, typography, components, and responsive design.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, including features, requirements, and deployment progress.
